text.div:
OrderSetItemSelectionBehavior

Defines selection behavior of a group

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/selection-behavior defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
any Any Any number of the items in the group may be chosen, from zero to all
all All All the items in the group must be selected as a single unit
all-or-none All Or None All the items in the group are meant to be chosen as a single unit: either all must be selected by the end user, or none may be selected
exactly-one Exactly One The end user must choose one and only one of the selectable items in the group. The user may not choose none of the items in the group
at-most-one At Most One The end user may choose zero or at most one of the items in the group
one-or-more One Or More The end user must choose a minimum of one, and as many additional as desired

name: OrderSetItemSelectionBehavior
description: Defines selection behavior of a group

concept.definition: Any number of the items in the group may be chosen, from zero to all
All the items in the group must be selected as a single unit
All the items in the group are meant to be chosen as a single unit: either all must be selected by the end user, or none may be selected
The end user must choose one and only one of the selectable items in the group. The user may not choose none of the items in the group
The end user may choose zero or at most one of the items in the group
The end user must choose a minimum of one, and as many additional as desired
